messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the greatest city of the Great Race?
Pnakotus
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary method of reproduction for the Great Race?
Spores
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long do individual Great Race members live?
4,000 to 5,000 years
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the cause of the extinction of the Great Race?
The flying polyps
You are a helpful AI assistant.
In what modern-day location was the greatest city of the Great Race, Pnakotus, found?
Australia
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the reason for the Great Race's long individual life spans?
4,000 to 5,000 years
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary means of reproduction for the Great Race?
Spores
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the criterion used by the Yithians to determine immigration?
Intelligence
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary characteristic of resources among the Great Race?
Resources are shared among their kind out of a sense of intellectual logic and proportion.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Great Race known for conquering?
time
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can a member of the Great Race do with a subject's mind?
trade minds with it
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the result of a member of the Great Race taking over a being's body?
that being’s mind is transferred into the body of the Great Race individual
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the reason behind the Great Race being called so?
They conquered time thoroughly.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the time frame for exchanging minds between a Great Race individual and a select individual in a different era?
About five years.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What kind of effect does a Great Race individual take on a being's mind when they inhabit its body?
The being's mind is transferred into the body of the Great Race individual.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is an INT roll needed to notice when a Great Race individual inhabits a being's body on Earth?
Many differences about the substitute.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary technique used by the Great Race to travel through time and space?
The primary technique used by the Great Race is to exchange places with an individual from a different era.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long do the minds of the individuals exchanged remain switched?
The minds are switched for about five years.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the memories of the individual restored to their own body?
The Great Race blanks all memory of what has happened while the victim was trapped in their age.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the individual who is held captive by the Great Race?
The individual may dream and have nightmares of being held by the Great Race.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the memory of a victim when they are restored to their own body?
The Great Race blanks all memory of what has happened while the victim was trapped.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary means by which a member of the Great Race can be met in its original cone-body?
Time-travel
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What do the Great Race visitors share with the cult in exchange for their assistance?
Technological or magical knowledge
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do the scattered cases of members of the Great Race involve the aeons?
Involving stasis cubes and sorcerous summonings
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary means by which a member of the Great Race could be met in its original cone-body?
Time-travel
You are a helpful AI assistant.
In what era did the hounds of Tindalos dwell on Earth?
The distant past, when normal life had not yet advanced past one-celled animals
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition of the hounds of Tindalos in the quoted passage?
Lean and athirst
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who wrote the passage 'They are lean and athirst!'?
Frank Belknap Long
